-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("TypeHelper", function (namespace)
    local Init, InitByLua
    Init = function ()
      InitByLua()
    end
    InitByLua = function ()
      System.try(function()
                   for k, v in pairs(ET) do
                       if v.__metadata__ and v.__metadata__.class then
                           ET.Game.getEventSystem():AddType(System.typeof(v))
                       end
                   end
               end, function(default)
                   local _e = default
                   ET.Log.Error1(_e)
               end)
    end
    return {
      Init = Init
    }
  end)
end)
